THE HI PROCESS

Our transparent 6-step investment journey ensures clarity, compliance, and optimal results. No hidden processes, no complex procedures – just professional wealth management done right.

01

BUDGET DETERMINATION

Define Your Investment Goals

BUDGET DETERMINATION

Define Your Investment Goals

We begin by understanding your financial objectives, risk tolerance, and investment timeline. Determine whether you need fixed income or growth-oriented strategies.

Investment goal assessment
Risk profile evaluation
Time horizon determination
Budget allocation planning
01
02

RDN OPENING

Ajaib Partnership & KYC

RDN OPENING

Ajaib Partnership & KYC

Open your Rekening Dana Nasabah (RDN) through our Ajaib partnership. Complete KYC process using referral code "wealthypeople" for streamlined onboarding.

RDN account opening with Ajaib
KYC documentation with referral
Bank account verification
Initial deposit setup
02
03

LEGAL FRAMEWORK

SPPD Agreement & Compliance

LEGAL FRAMEWORK

SPPD Agreement & Compliance

Sign the Surat Perjanjian Pengelolaan Dana (SPPD) with proper stamp duty. This legal framework ensures transparency and protects both parties.

SPPD agreement signing
Stamp duty payment
Legal compliance verification
Terms and conditions review
03
04

ACCESS PROVISION

Secure Login Credentials

ACCESS PROVISION

Secure Login Credentials

Provide secure login credentials for portfolio management access. We ensure you have full visibility into your investment account and performance.

Secure credential setup
Account access verification
Dashboard orientation
Security protocols explanation
04
05

MONITORING

Regular Transparency & Tracking

MONITORING

Regular Transparency & Tracking

Enjoy complete transparency with regular performance monitoring. Track your portfolio growth through detailed monthly reports and quarterly reviews.

Monthly performance reports
Portfolio tracking dashboard
Risk monitoring alerts
Quarterly review meetings
05
06

MANAGEMENT

Ongoing Optimization & Reporting

MANAGEMENT

Ongoing Optimization & Reporting

Benefit from active portfolio management with ongoing optimization strategies. Receive comprehensive reporting and strategic adjustments as needed.

Active portfolio management
Strategic rebalancing
Tax optimization strategies
Annual performance reviews
06

WHY OUR PROCESS WORKS

Every step is designed for transparency, compliance, and optimal client outcomes.

1

TRANSPARENT

Every step is clearly explained with full documentation and client visibility.

2

COMPLIANT

All procedures follow Indonesian financial regulations and industry best practices.

3

EFFICIENT

Streamlined process minimizes paperwork while maintaining thoroughness.

4

CLIENT-CENTRIC

Designed around client needs with regular communication and feedback loops.

COMPLETE TRANSPARENCY

Monitor your investment performance in real-time through our secure dashboard. Full visibility into portfolio composition, returns, and risk metrics.

Real-time portfolio performance
Detailed asset allocation breakdown
Monthly and quarterly reports
Risk assessment and monitoring
Direct communication with your manager
